description:
The installer includes the cross-compilers, OpenOCD, cmake and Ninja build tool. 
    
    The installer can also download and run installers for Python 3.7 and Git For Windows if they are not already installed on the computer.
  
    ## Post-install, ensure dependencies (in case it does not detect correct python)
    * `py -3 -m pip install --user -r $IDF_PATH/requirements.txt`
